verbs.description: as [ARG1: the megyn kelly drama] [V: intensifies] [C-ARG1: tamron hall awkward] nbc exit is back in the spotlight megyn kelly appears to be on her way out at today according to sources who told the washington post that her show will stop airing after her comment about blackface being ok when she was a child news of her likely exit comes less than two years after her own controversial start at the network back then she took over the today time slot held by al roker and tamron hall leading to hall sudden exit from nbc the rumors raged in early 2017 that the today show lineup was primed for a shake - up according to reports citing inside sources nbc was in talks with former fox news anchor kelly to take over the 9 a m slot which at the time was anchored by roker and hall then on feb nabj lady michelle obama twitter tamron hall tuskegee university megyn kelly tamron nbc the spotlight hall matt lauer al roker soledad o'brien national association of black journalists fox harlem united boulevard bash gala ann curry msnbc fox news

[ARGM-TMP: as the megyn kelly drama intensifies tamron hall awkward] [ARG1: nbc exit] [V: is] [ARG2: back in the spotlight] megyn kelly appears to be on her way out at today according to sources who told the washington post that her show will stop airing after her comment about blackface being ok when she was a child news of her likely exit comes less than two years after her own controversial start at the network back then she took over the today time slot held by al roker and tamron hall leading to hall sudden exit from nbc the rumors raged in early 2017 that the today show lineup was primed for a shake - up according to reports citing inside sources nbc was in talks with former fox news anchor kelly to take over the 9 a m slot which at the time was anchored by roker and hall then on feb nabj lady michelle obama twitter tamron hall tuskegee university megyn kelly tamron nbc the spotlight hall matt lauer al roker soledad o'brien national association of black journalists fox harlem united boulevard bash gala ann curry msnbc fox news
